description: En Translations for 'MSF Mental Health - PHQ-9'

translations.Over the last 2 weeks, how often have yo: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
translations.Little interest or pleasure in doing thi: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
translations.Trouble falling or staying asleep or sle: Trouble falling or staying asleep or sleeping too much
translations.Feeling tired or having little energy: Feeling tired or having little energy
translations.Feeling bad about yourself - or that you: Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
translations.Trouble concentrating on things such as: Trouble concentrating on things such as reading the newspaper or watching television
translations.Moving or speaking so slowly that other: Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
translations.Thoughts that you would be better off de: Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
translations.If you checked off any problems, how dif: If you checked off any problems, how difficult have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
